pageTitle: Add or reduce zones on your Travelcard
description: Information on how to reduce or add zones on your Travelcard for TfL travel.

breadcrumbs.title: Add or reduce zones on your Travelcard

title.title: Add or reduce zones on your Travelcard

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can add or reduce the zones on your Travelcard."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
There must be at least 1 month and 1 day remaining on your Travelcard at the date of change, not the date of your request.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["7 Day or monthly Travelcards","Your Travelcard if you bought it from National Rail, Abellio or Trainline","Your Travelcard if you paid for it using a warrant","Your Travelcard if you previously reduced the zones on it\u003cbr /\u003e"]}
It will take up to 5 working days to process and issue you with a replacement card.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"If your Travelcard is on an Oyster card"}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"If your Travelcard is a paper ticket"}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Ticket","Contact details (name, address and phone number)","Which zones you want to change it to"]}
